title: Shiba Inu (SHIB) Undersold per This Indicator
author: Tomiwabold Olajide
excerpt: Dog-themed cryptocurrency Shiba Inu might be undersold if going by its NVT ratio. IntoTheBlock's NVT indicator compares the market capitalization of a blockchain's native token to its total transacted value over a given period.

title: Crypto Whale Longing Ethereum (ETH) in Fix as Liquidation Beckons
author: Tomiwabold Olajide
excerpt: A crypto whale with long Ethereum (ETH) position seems to be facing a big dilemma, according to on-chain analytics firm Lookonchain.

title: Every XRP Holder Wins: Major Ripple Partner Brings out NFT Giveaway
author: Gamza Khanzadaev
excerpt: In a move that has captured the interest of the crypto community, Uphold, a major crypto platform and partner of Ripple, has reminded everybody of a unique promotion that rewards every XRP holder. The Uphold XRP Army Promotion, which commenced on July 31, 2023, is gearing up for its grand finale at the end of this month, marking the last chance for participants to ascend the ranks.

title: Mastercard Trials CBDC-NFT Purchase Integration in Australia
author: Alex Dovbnya
excerpt: Mastercard has taken a progressive step in digital commerce by successfully trialing an integration of central bank digital currency (CBDC) with non-fungible token (NFT) purchases in Australia.

title: SEC to Announce Grayscale ETF Decision Today, Here’s What Happens Otherwise
author: Yuri Molchan
excerpt: The US securities and exchange regulatory body SEC is approaching the deadline for announcing its decision on whether it will approve Grayscale to convert its Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) into a Bitcoin spot ETF – this is expected to happen today at midnight.

title: SHIB Team Issues Crucial Warning to Shiba Inu Army
author: Yuri Molchan
excerpt: The official marketing expert of the SHIB developer team, who calls herself Lucie, has taken to the X social media platform to warn the Shiba Inu army against falling for this massive scam that is threatening them.

title: Ethereum (ETH) Has Something 'Scary' Happening in Background
author: Arman Shirinyan
excerpt: Ethereum's recent developments in the futures market are causing a stir. The charts are whispering some alarming messages, and those in the know are paying close attention.

title: XRP and Bitcoin (BTC) Trading Unlocked for International Institutions by Coinbase and Talos
author: Gamza Khanzadaev
excerpt: In a significant stride for the institutional digital asset trading sector, Talos has seamlessly integrated with Coinbase International Exchange. This integration empowers clients in specific non-U.S. regions to directly participate in perpetual futures trading via the Talos platform. This development showcases the growing interest in popular cryptocurrencies such as XRP and Bitcoin (BTC) among institutional investors.

title: Investors Risk Losing Massive Altcoin Position, Here's Why
author: Arman Shirinyan
excerpt: Recently, whales with substantial holdings in WBTC, ETH, LINK, UNI, and MKR fell under the risk of facing liquidation. Investors, who had utilized the Aave platform, began offloading WBTC to service their debt. With assets deposited on Aave amounting to $11 million and borrowing worth $8.45 million in stablecoins, the current health rate stands at a precarious 1.08. This puts the investor dangerously close to liquidation risk, potentially setting the stage for significant market volatility.

title: XRP Transaction Volume up 8% as Bullish Optimism Returns
author: Godfrey Benjamin
excerpt: There is a mild bullish optimism returning to the market as XRP is wriggling out of a bearish trend, according to on-chain data. At the time of writing, XRP has jumped by 1.31% to $0.4825, a recovery that has ended the more than six consecutive days of losses it has printed.

title: Paolo Ardoino Appointed as Tether CEO
author: Alex Dovbnya
excerpt: Tether, the flagship stablecoin issuer, announced today the appointment of Paolo Ardoino as its new chief executive officer.

title: XRP Displaces USDC in This Market Index: Details
author: Godfrey Benjamin
excerpt: The Hong Kong Virtual Assets Consortium (HKVAC) has recognized XRP’s latest growth maneuvers by adding digital currency to the HKVAC Cryptocurrency Global Large Top5 Index. This inclusion is revered in part because it was achieved after XRP displaced USD Coin (USDC) from the 5th position in terms of market capitalization ranking.

title: Shiba Inu's BONE Eyes On-chain Explosion With 1,680% Growth
author: Gamza Khanzadaev
excerpt: In a surprising development, the Shiba Inu ecosystem has experienced an extraordinary surge in on-chain transactions, particularly concerning the BONE token. According to data, there has been an unprecedented 1,680% increase in large transactions valued at $100,000 or more.

title: Cardano (ADA) Eyes 2,448% Increase to $6 per This Price Prediction
author: Gamza Khanzadaev
excerpt: In the midst of Cardano's recent price tumble, ADA enthusiasts may find solace in a bold prediction by prominent analyst Ali Martinez. Analyzing Cardano's current market trends, Martinez has offered a glimmer of hope to the community of the popular token. In a recent tweet, the analyst drew parallels between the ongoing consolidation phase of Cardano and a similar period between 2018 and 2020.

title: Millions of XRP Tokens Moved to Major Exchanges - Is Sell-off Coming?
author: Yuri Molchan
excerpt: Whale Alert tracker has noticed that within the last 24 hours, anonymous wallet addresses made two transfers to leading crypto trading venues Bitso and Bitstamp, carrying close to 64 million XRP in total.

title: Solana (SOL) Developer Ready to Pay $400,000 If You Find This Piece of Code
author: Arman Shirinyan
excerpt: In a tantalizing challenge for coders and blockchain enthusiasts worldwide, a whopping reward of $400,000 has been announced for anyone who can locate the code that can purportedly "turn off" the Solana network. The buzz surrounding this challenge has its roots in a recent court hearing that sent shockwaves through the crypto community.

title: Shiba Inu's BONE Millionaire Addresses Spike Amid Price Lull
author: Tomiwabold Olajide
excerpt: Shiba Inu governance token and Shibarium gas token BONE is seeing an uptick in millionaire addresses.

title: DOGE Founder Has 8,600 Worth of DOGE Stolen, Here's What Happened
author: Yuri Molchan
excerpt: Billy Markus, known on Twitter as "Shibetoshi Nakamoto," who created the original meme coin DOGE together with Jackson Palmer in 2013, announced on Twitter that during his ongoing trip to Japan, he has had a substantial amount of money stolen from him.

title: Ripple Attracting Institutional Investors in Dubai, Cramer Issues Major Bitcoin Price Warning, Mysterious SHIB Whale Buys Billions of SHIB: Crypto News Digest by U.Today
author: Valeria Blokhina
excerpt: Here are the top three news stories presented to you by U.Today.

title: Coinbase Provides Update on SEC Rulemaking Petition
author: Tomiwabold Olajide
excerpt: Coinbase Chief Legal Officer Paul Grewal provides the latest update on Coinbase's rulemaking petition requesting regulatory clarity from the SEC.

title: Cardano (ADA) Addresses in Loss Hit 93%, What's Happening?
author: Godfrey Benjamin
excerpt: Cardano (ADA) is not living up to the expectations of its investors as the number of addresses that have dipped into losses have hit what appears to be an all-time low (ATL). Data from market analytics platform IntoTheBlock (ITB) showed that the total number of addresses in loss has slumped to 93.61%.

title: Ethereum: New Geth Version Fixes Critical Bug
author: Alex Dovbnya
excerpt: The new version of Ethereum's Go Ethereum (Geth) client, Geth v1.13.3, was released earlier this Thursday. This update primarily addresses a rare bug found in the Pebble database, known to cause significant runaway disk and CPU usage, according to Péter Szilágyi, Ethereum's team lead.

title: Bitcoin (BTC) Options Worth $640 Million Set to Expire
author: Alex Dovbnya
excerpt: Bitcoin, the flagship cryptocurrency, is about to see a shakeup as options contracts with a significant notional value are on the cusp of expiration.

title: Bitcoin (BTC) Holding Steady as Genesis Blocks Withdrawals
author: Alex Dovbnya
excerpt: Cryptocurrency broker Genesis has reportedly suspended withdrawals. Bitcoin, the largest cryptocurrency, has remained stable, currently trading at $26,591, according to CoinGecko data.

title: Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) Discount Keeps Plunging
author: Alex Dovbnya
excerpt: Grayscale Bitcoin Trust's (GBTC) discount, which was at a staggering 43% when BlackRock filed for a spot Bitcoin ETF in mid-June, has significantly narrowed down to 16.5%.

title: Cardano Unveils New Progress Report as Analyst Predicts 2,500% Rise in ADA Price
author: Gamza Khanzadaev
excerpt: In a revelation today, Cardano, the blockchain project known for its ADA token, released its weekly development report. The report comes hot on the heels of a bold prediction by analyst Ali Martinez, who suggested that ADA could experience a staggering 2,500% surge in value.

title: XRP Finally Reaches This Substantial Support Level
author: Arman Shirinyan
excerpt: XRP has hit a significant milestone, reaching a crucial support level at approximately $0.47. As of the latest data, XRP is trading at $0.4838, teetering on the edge of this substantial threshold. This specific price point is imbued with notable buying power, a fact that market participants are eyeing with heightened interest.

title: SHIB, DOGE, BTC Accepted for Tickets for Taylor Swift's Eras Tour Movie: Details
author: Yuri Molchan
excerpt: The news is spreading that, thanks to a new collaboration with the BitPay crypto payment gateway, SHIB, DOGE, ETH, XRP and many other cryptos will now be accepted for tickets to the new Taylor Swift movie, called "The Eras Tour."

title: Ripple CLO Slams Crypto Policy in US, Calls for Radical Reforms
author: Gamza Khanzadaev
excerpt: In a scathing critique of the current regulatory landscape in the United States, Stuart Alderoty, the chief legal officer at Ripple, has called for radical reforms in the country's approach to cryptocurrencies and other digital assets. Speaking on CNBC's Street Signs program, Alderoty expressed his frustration over the lack of a rational regulatory framework for the burgeoning crypto industry in the U.S.

title: Cardano's Midnight Superpowers Uncovered: Details
author: Godfrey Benjamin
excerpt: Cardano (ADA) has been making the rounds lately with its newly introduced sidechain, the Midnight Protocol. Taking to its official account on X social media, the protocol, through Input Output Global (IOG) founder Charles Hoskinson, revealed its core visions. These are based on three concepts, including freedom of Association, freedom of Commerce, and freedom of Expression, collectively called ACE.
